intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: At alecsdesign, I respect your privacy and am committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how I collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit my website or use my services.

dataCollection.title: Information I Collect
dataCollection.intro: I collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.item1: Contact information (name, email, phone number) when you fill out the contact form
dataCollection.item2: Business information you provide when requesting a quote or consultation
dataCollection.item3: Technical data collected through cookies and analytics (IP address, browser type, device information)
dataCollection.item4: Communication history when we interact via email, phone, or WhatsApp

dataUse.title: How I Use Your Information
dataUse.item1: Respond to your inquiries and provide the services you request
dataUse.item2: Communicate with you about projects, quotes, and updates
dataUse.item3: Improve my website and services based on analytics data
dataUse.item4: Send occasional updates about my services (only if you opt in)

analytics.title: Analytics and Cookies
analytics.text: I use analytics tools to understand how visitors interact with my website. This helps me improve user experience and optimize my services. These tools may use cookies to collect anonymous usage data. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings or using the cookie banner on this website.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: My website uses cookies for essential functionality, analytics, and to remember your preferences. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time. For more details, please see my Cookie Policy.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: I may use third-party services like email providers, analytics platforms, and hosting services. These providers have their own privacy policies, and I prioritize providers with strong data protection standards.

dataProtection.title: Data Security
dataProtection.text: I take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR and other privacy laws, you have the right to:
yourRights.item1: Access the personal data I hold about you
yourRights.item2: Request correction or deletion of your data
yourRights.item3: Object to processing of your personal data
yourRights.item4: Withdraw consent at any time (where processing is based on consent)

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how I handle your data, please contact me using the information provided on this website.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using this website or engaging my services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use my services.

services.title: Services Offered
services.text: I provide professional web development and design services including but not limited to: website development, web applications, e-commerce solutions, and digital consulting. All services are provided on a project-by-project basis unless otherwise agreed.

project.title: Project Process
project.intro: Each project follows this general process:
project.item1: Free initial consultation to understand your needs
project.item3: Agreement on scope, deliverables, and payment terms
project.item4: Development, review, and launch phases with ongoing communication

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.text: Payment terms are agreed upon for each project individually. Typically, projects require a deposit upfront with the balance due upon completion. Specific payment schedules will be outlined in the project agreement.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.text: Upon full payment, you will own the final delivered website or application code. I retain the right to use the work in my portfolio unless otherwise agreed. Third-party components, libraries, and frameworks remain under their respective licenses.

warranty.title: Warranties and Support
warranty.text: I provide a warranty period for bug fixes and issues directly related to my code, as defined in our project agreement. Ongoing maintenance is arranged separately. I cannot guarantee compatibility with future third-party updates beyond my control.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, I shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of my services or website. My total liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific project in question.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: Either party may terminate a project agreement with written notice. If you terminate a project, you will be responsible for payment for work completed up to that point. If I terminate due to non-payment or breach of agreement, no refund will be provided.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.text: These terms are governed by the laws of Italy. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Rome, Italy.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: I reserve the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact me through the contact form on this website.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, understand how you use the site, and improve your experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like navigation, security, and language preferences. The website cannot work properly without these cookies.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.text: These cookies help me understand how visitors interact with my website by collecting anonymous information. This data helps me improve the site and provide a better user experience.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.text: These cookies remember your preferences and choices (like language selection) to provide a more personalized experience.

item1.name: Language Preference
item1.desc: Remembers your chosen language (English, Italian, or Romanian)

item2.name: Cookie Consent
item2.desc: Remembers your cookie preferences so I don't ask you again

item3.name: Analytics
item3.desc: Anonymous data to understand visitor behavior and improve the website

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.text: Some cookies may be set by third-party services I use, such as analytics providers. These services have their own privacy policies and cookie practices.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.text: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse cookies or delete existing ones. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of this website.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.text: I may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.text: If you have any questions about how I use cookies, please contact me through the contact form on this website.
